Chapter 10. License

FindBugs is free software distributed under the terms of the Lesser GNU Public License. You should have received a copy of the license in the file LICENSE.txt in the FindBugs distribution.

You can find the latest version of FindBugs, along with its source code, from the FindBugs web page.
